articles.description: Alteryx, Inc. (NYSE: AYX), a leader in analytic process automation (APA), today announced financial results for its third quarter ended September 30, 2020.
articles.content:
Third Quarter Revenue of $129.7 million , up 25% Year-Over-Year
Annual Recurring Revenue of $449.5 million , up 38% Year-Over-Year

articles.title: This Beloved Pet Store Is Closing All US Locations - msnNOW
articles.description: Despite bumps for Petco and Chewy, popular pet chain Pet Valu is closing all of its 358 stores across the U.S. amid the COVID-related retail crisis.
articles.content: Businesses from major mall chains to local coffee shops have been shuttering amid the pandemic, and the latest store to succumb to the current economic climate is particularly sad news for pet parent… [+1816 chars]
